original_text: But they that have gathered it shall eat it, and praise the Lord; and they that have brought it together shall drink it in the courts of my holiness.
korean_text: 오직 추수한 자가 그것을 먹고 나 여호와를 찬송할 것이요 거둔 자가 그것을 나의 성소 뜰에서 마시리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: But they that have gathered it shall eat it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그것을 모은 자들은 그것을 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and they that have brought it together
shall drink it in the courts of my holiness
